40 
41  ROS_INFO("Press enter to close gripper");
42  std::cin.get();
43 
44  // Close
45  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<franka_gripper::GraspAction> client("/franka_gripper/grasp", true);
46  client.waitForServer();
47  franka_gripper::GraspGoal goal;
48  goal.width = 0.01;
49  goal.speed = 0.03;
50  goal.force = 3.0;
51  goal.epsilon.inner = 0.5;
52  goal.epsilon.outer = 0.5;
53  client.sendGoal(goal);
54 
55  bool finished_before_timeout = client.waitForResult(ros::Duration(30.0));
56 
57  if (finished_before_timeout)
58  {
59  actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState state = client.getState();
60  ROS_INFO("Action finished: %s",state.toString().c_str());
61  }
62  else {
63  ROS_ERROR("Action did not finish before the time out.");
64  }
65 }
